name: Mythic Pearls: The Legend of Tirnanog
name_original: Mythic Pearls: The Legend of Tirnanog
description: Find a way to control the Mythic Pearls and align 3 of the same kind in a row! Travel throughout the legendary region of Tirnanog, stopping along your adventures to subdue the power of the pearls. Tirnanog is a vast land. and there will be instances where you must decide upon the path you must take. Magical power-ups will assist you throughout your journey.
